halloween20.acRose: What are you giving me in exchange of these, kid?

australis.greet:
Oh my, oh my, you've found me! I thought maybe with this beanie on I could blend in more easily. I couldn't be more wrong.
Anyway, this town is bustling with people giving away candy here and there. I also got some exotic stuff you might enjoy.
Have a look!
australis.amulet:
Aha, this one? This is some really ancient amulet I found somewhere far away. They're just like the bunch of knock-offs the crazy orange sister is giving away, but this one is something else!
How about it? I can take five or your knock-off replicas. {{amuletemj}} **5 Ancient Amulets**
australis.roses:
This one i found in a box full of old stuff in a mausoleum close to the cemetary. Nobody seemed to care so I took them all. They look in perfect condition! Are you taking one?
I'd like {{roseemj}} **5 Wicked Roses** on it, please.
australis.candy: People think my attire is some sort of costume, and they gave me candy whenever I knocked at their doors. Pretty fun huh? I can sell you a bunch of them for {{rbnemj}} **10 000 Rubines**
australis.jiangshi: This one is one of my favorites! I can give you them in exchange for a good condition **Jiangshi Set**
australis.alraune: This one was one of my best finds! Those can be yours for a complete **Alraune Set**.
australis.sticker: Do you like Stickers? These ones I made myself! They're absolute high quality and one of a kind. **2500 Candy** for them. Deal?
australis.finisher: Perfect! It was a pleasure to do business with you~

avatar.clickHere: Click here and download this image to use as avatar.
avatar.preview: This is a preview of your avatar. Confirm to receive a larger version.
avatar.dusk: Your avatar tells you're in the **Dusk Covenant**
avatar.night: Your avatar tells you're in the **Umbral Covenant**
avatar.inad: It doesn't seem to be aligned with any of the covenants. Try `{{prefix}}eventavatar [umbral|dusk]` to pick one!
avatar.fine: It seems to be just fine!
avatar.opos: It seems to be the opposite of what you intended.
avatar.diff: It does not belong to any of the covenants.

arsenika.acCask: Good. You're doing me a favor removing this from my parish's backyard... but what are you giving me in exchange for this **Casket**?
arsenika.acToken: Right, right. Tokens it is... What you have there for these?
arsenika.noCashR: Hmmm hmmm, you see, our parish is kinda in need of funding, so I can't do this for free for you.
arsenika.noCashC: You're doing a poor job at getting those candies huh? It seems you don't have enough of them.
arsenika.howMany: So, how many of these do you want?  *wink* *wink*
arsenika.completeC: This candy will be put to good use. Now go back to the town and have fun!
arsenika.completeR: Eheheh, nice! Thanks for the contribution to the Dusk Parish's fund~
arsenika.timeout: Hey sonny, I know the place is beautiful but you can't stay here all night... shoo!
arsenika.cancel: Hm? Nothing? Were you here to admire my flawless figure?.
arsenika.greet: Hello hello little one! What brings you here? Oh. I see... so, have you been to our parish before? We're in need of some funding so we're accepting some Candies and Rubines in exchange of some goodies. What do you think?

noctix.acCask: Teehee. After you get the first, you can't stop anymore, huh? So, what are you giving me in exchange for this **Casket**?
noctix.acDoll: Oooh, sneaky one~ This doll will automatically wander around as soon as you pay me, how you'd like to pay for it?
noctix.acToken: Tokens, tokens for the stupid tin can with tits. Y'all only think of that. Fine, what are you gonna give me for these?
noctix.noCashR: You see, these red gemstones mean nothing to me but... that doesn't mean I'm gonna give you a discount!
noctix.noCashC: I can't do business on an empty stomach, you'll need to bring me more candy if you want a deal!
noctix.howMany: So, how many of these do you want?
noctix.completeC: Yum! Very good, thanks for the candy. Now return to your realm and have fun!
noctix.completeR: Nice. I'm sure I'll find a use for these gems someday. Now return to your realm and have fun!
noctix.timeout: Um, if you're not doing anything... can we go back to our world now?
noctix.timeout2:
Shut up, tin head! Let your master think!
Wait... where are you two going?
noctix.cancel: Hm? Nothing? Well, you know where to find me.
noctix.greet:
Greetings. It seems your obsession for the dead has brought you to me. How... *sweet*...
Well, you're in the right place! I can offer a variety of goods for you. The same way you're a fanatic for corpse fashion, I'm a fanatic for candy! Bring me all the ones you have!

**By the way**, this is tomato juice what I'm drinking. Stop looking at me like that!
noctix.list:
**Caskets**
These contain the spookiest garments to be used as your ultra spoopy costume, spook people around and they'll give more candy!
**Decoy Doll** 
A cursed artifact that will wander around and make your neighbours forget that you've been to their door a couple minutes ago. Use it to bypass the 6h cooldown from spooking.
**Event Tokens**
Give these to that stupid robot girl you hang around with. She will trade them for decorative stuff.

spook.advisor: Hey! You can't go around to spook dressed like this. Go get some better attire!
spook.spookintro: You tried to spook around with your costume...
spook.followup:
That was scary indeed. You got **{{count}} Candy** for such spoopiness~

*But your costume has lost Spook Power for being already known in the neighbourhood.*
spook.cooldown: The neighbourhood is still startled from your last spook... wait up {{Xhours}} before showing up again!
spook.cooldown_alt: The neighbourhood is still startled from your last spook... wait up {{Xhours}} before showing up again, or buy a **decoy doll** from the **Gravekeeper**!

dig.needShovel: You need a {{SHOVEL_LINK}} to dig! Go find one!
dig.shovelbroke: You hit a rock so hard with your Shovel that it broke into pieces...
dig.cooldown:
The graveyard lies dormant...
There's nothing you can dig here for the next {{Xtime}}.

wardrobe.confirmSave: Are you sure you want to lock this garment in your memento collection? This cannot be undone!
wardrobe.confirmSave2: The garment has been saved in your memento collection! Show off your collection progress with `{{prefix}}memento`
wardrobe.mementoExists: You already have an item like this in your memento collection. They need to be unique!
wardrobe.mementoDamaged: This garment is heavily damaged! you can't store it like this...
wardrobe.brief:
Use the `#X` Number to perform actions on a certain item.
For more info use `p!wardrobe help`
​

caskets.tooManyGar: You can only hold 12 garments at a time! Either sell or destroy one of your current ones.
caskets.gotCasket: You dug out **1 Casket!** Next Casket will be available in 6 hours!
caskets.noCasket: You have no Caskets to open... Go dig some!
caskets.hasCask: You have **{{count}} Casket** in your backyard.
caskets.hasCask_plural: You have **{{count}} Caskets** in your backyard.
commentary: By the way I really hope that's tomato sauce.
You're gonna need to wash this first.
Is it me, or did the coffin move when you grabbed that?
SPOOKY SCARY SKELETONS, SEND SHIVERS DOWN YOUR SPINE
How long after they're dead is it considered archaeology instead of grave robbing?
Oh, that's so cute! I remember seeing that on the rack a few months ago!
I'm not saying ghosts exist but 'ectoplasmic goop' is how I'd describe what's on that.
And I think you accidentally took off part of someone's arm.
Be nice if someone held my hand in the scary graveyard. *Cough*.

casketine.quiet: This seems quiet . . . a little too quiet.
casketine.notsus: Nothing suspicious over here... at all.
casketine.oly: Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't realise we were in the middle of the *"Who has the most dead stuff"* Olympics

caskets.openintro:
**{{user}}** opened the casket...
Inside it there  was:

halloween17.treat: ***Trick or Treat!***  You got **{{qtd}}** candies from this Server's stash!
halloween17.treatRefresh:
No no no! You already got your candies, shoo!
You can come back in **{{remaining}}**
halloween17.current_event:
Hey~ Did you know there is a global **Halloween Event** going on? :jack_o_lantern:
In this event you can get some cool and __exclusive__ pretty stuff for your `p!profile` card!
Available only during this event, which will be running until **November 5th**
More info at <http://pollux.fun/events/haloween> *(page in english)*
*Contact your Server Owner to check if this server is participating*
halloween17.newAccOut: :warning: Sorry, new accounts cannot participate. Perhaps you can join the next one.
halloween17.nextThis: You can Trick or Treat here again at:
halloween17.candiesCheck: You collected **{{amt}}** candies so far. Keep knocking at servers to get more!
halloween17.candieRank: These are the most candy-rich guys around the block
halloween17.candyprize: The best ranked users will get some nice rewards at the end of the event!

xmas17.droprates: This Server's Event Box drop rate has been increased by **{{amount}}x**
xmas17.bori_receive: Borealis received **{{herKeys}} Keys** %EMJ% from this Server
xmas17.absentElf: Seems like {{elfie}} is not around, try again later.
xmas17.shopUpdate:
{{role2}} {{role1}}:
 The trader has **new items** in stock!
xmas17.noFunds_key: Hmmm... seems that you don't have enough Keys
xmas17.austra_buy: Is that the item you'd like? For **{{price}}** Winding Keys it can be all yours! Deal?
xmas17.austra_checkout: **Done!** It has been a great pleasure doing business with you~!
xmas17.austra_noFunds: Sorry, we're both wasting our times here. You don't have enough Keys for that. But I can give it to you anyways if you give me **{{rubAmount}}** Rubines.
xmas17.austra_ultimatePoverty: ...which apparently you don't have either. Shoo!
xmas17.austra_exg: I can exchange my Keys for a fair amount of your Rubines, but I'm much more interested in Keys.Use commands like these to exchange with me:
xmas17.help_elf: Checks if there are elves around
xmas17.australis_bio: Australis is the elf of Midsummer Xmas, at Santa's southern assembly lines. Since Santa doesn't supervise them, she does everything within her reach to get back lost Winding Keys, even sneaking goodies and reselling them for a much lower price
xmas17.borealis_bio: Borealis is a young part-time elf from Santa's main assembly lines at the North Pole. She volunteered to help find the lost Winding Keys. She's one of Santa's favorite apprentices, so he takes her suggestions quite seriously.
xmas17.au_function: Australis trades Items for Winding Keys, the Rarity Tier of the items depends on how much keys she already has.
xmas17.bo_function: Borealis collects Winding Keys and takes them back to Santa. The Drop Rate of Event Lootboxes is increased significantly based on how many keys she has.
xmas17.elfAppears:
{{notify_roles}}:
One of Santa's elves just spawned in this server!
**{{aust_or_borea}}** will be here for {{amount}} hours. Use `{{prefix}}{{elf}}` to talk to her.
xmas17.automessage:
**PolluXmas Global Event Info**
This channel will be used to post event updates for this Server.

Updates include:
  - *Santa's elves Spawns*
  - *New items with the Trader Elf*
  - *Drop Rate updates from Collector Elf*

There are three Utility Roles for this event, get them if you want to be notified.
{{genericRole}} - for **all** updates.
{{austri}} - for **trader** updates.
{{bori}} - for **collector** updates.
xmas17.traderElfText:
I need some Winding Keys that were lost from Santa's Factory, have you seen any?
**I can exchange them for some neat goodies!**
xmas17.collectorElfText:
I'm Collecting lost Winding Keys from servers, have you seen any?
**With these keys we will be able to deliver Present Boxes faster to your server!**
xmas17.theseElf: These are the elves that are currently in this server:
xmas17.thisElf: This is the elf that is currently in this server:
xmas17.noElf: There is no elf currently in this server:
xmas17.configIntro: PolluXmas event has been configured in your server! Feel free to move around and rename these roles and Channels, if you delete them, you may need to run autoconfig again. **All event progress will be lost if you do so.**
xmas17.configInfo:
Tell your members to use these roles to get notifications about the event and/or to be notified about their preferred elf spawning.
**DO __NOT__ EDIT POLLUX PERMS ON THE EVENT CHANNEL!** The developer cannot recover lost event data if that ever occurs.
xmas17.thankKys: Thanks a lot! Santa may deliver presents here **{{amount}}x** faster now due to your kindness~
xmas17.howmanyKys: Ah, thank you! How many keys do you have to give me?
xmas17.noFunds_bo: It seems you don't have that many keys.

wintersummer.title: Pollux Solstice Event: Flowers & Snowflakes
wintersummer.joiningthis:
Joining this faction you will get exclusive themed items like:
  • Special Flairs
  •  Sticker Boosterpacks
  • Exclusive guest-artist Backgrounds
wintersummer.joinfirst: You're not yet participating in the event, please use `{{prefix}}eventjoin` to join
wintersummer.traderintro:
-Hellooo wanderer! Welcome to my humble improvised shop.

-I don't have much but I have something I know **you** want, You have something I want.
-How about a deal?
-Y'know, I can increase how often Lootboxes will be shipped to this server the more you buy from me~
wintersummer.traderejecc: Hmph... Alright, it's your loss. I'll be around in case you change your mind. Peace.
wintersummer.tradertimeout: Hmm, well, don't stay there staring at the shopkeeper. Come on, we come back when you decide.
wintersummer.tradertimeout_followup: Yeah, what she said. Stop staring. BTW my eyes are up here.
wintersummer.tradebuying: I knew you were a smart person. Come over, that's {{count}} {{currency}} for every {{collectible}}. How many of them you want?
wintersummer.numberPls: Please tell me the **number** of items you want.
wintersummer.noFundsEvent: Hold on! You can't pay for this!
wintersummer.allDoneTraderFLW: {{interj}} Here is your Flower, also I'm increasing the Lootbox delivery rate of this server by **{{amt_inc}}%**
wintersummer.allDoneTraderSFK: {{interj}} Here is your Snowflake, also I'm increasing the Lootbox delivery rate of this server by **{{amt_inc}}%**
wintersummer.allDoneTraderFLW_plural: {{interj}} Here are your Flowers, also I'm increasing the Lootbox delivery rate of this server by **{{amt_inc}}%**
wintersummer.allDoneTraderSFK_plural: {{interj}} Here are your Snowflakes, also I'm increasing the Lootbox delivery rate of this server by **{{amt_inc}}%**
wintersummer.propicCheck:
{{emoji}} |  **This is your event Profile Pic**
  Setting this as your avatar will increase the income of Flowers/Snowflakes you Receive. 

**Please ensure you save this with __exactly 256×256 px__ or it will not work!**
*Your Discord's zoom **will** interfere with the image, if unsure click the image and then **Open original**.*

SFK.leaderIntro: Greetings, my fellow. Looks like you got some **Crystaline Snowflakes** there to turn in. Splendid! How many of these are we offering to the Winter Spirits today?
SFK.insufficient: Excuse me, my child. Can you please check the amount of your belongings correctly? You do not have this much Snowflakes.
SFK.zero: Hmmm, whad do we have here? What do you want? If you have no Snowflakes with you, don't waste both of our times. Now begone!
SFK.alldone: Splendid! The spirits will remember this! Now shoo!
SFK.alldone2: Actually... come over, I have something for you, child.
SFK.timeout: Are you going to waste time staring at me? If so please refrain from doing so while being within my sight!
SFK.desc:
Representing the Ice Queen, your task is to collect **Crystaline Snowflakes**
These snowflakes can be used for either of these purposes:

 • Deliver them to Nikolinys's Frost Idol to fill your faction's pool and receive major prizes depending on your contribution and global milestones.
 • Consume some snowflakes to increase the decay rate of the adversary Flowers pool.
 • Offer the snowflakes yourself to the winter deity. This will grant you quick but less interesting prizes, no items above (U) can be received from this method.
SFK.desc2: Quest for the Idol of Eternal Frost
SFK.nowpart: You now are part of the **Ice Queen's Winter Faction**! This is a list of what you can do now. Use `+eventhelp` To see these instructions whenever you want.
SFK.daily: After some hours of snowfall, you managed to gather **{{count}} Snowflakes**.
SFK.payX: You are giving me {{count}} Snowflakes. Is that correct?

FLW.nowpart: You now are part of the Fey Druidess' Summer Faction
FLW.leaderIntro: Oh, hello, bud! I can see you carrying some **Blossoming Flowers** with you to be turned in. That's so nice! How many of these are we going to offer to the Summer Spirits?
FLW.insufficient: Um... Listen, let's double check how many Flowers we have so the gods won't be angry for receiving less than expected. You don't have enough Flowers.
FLW.zero: Hey, hi there! Are you here to turn in Flowers? Ah, I see you don't have any with you, see you later!
FLW.alldone: Awesome! More flowers to the spirits, thanks for your collaboration! Take care!
FLW.alldone2: Ah, actually, hold on! I have something here for ya!
FLW.timeout: Heeey, are you still here? Well, I'll be right here if you need me again. Cheers!
FLW.desc:
Representing the Fey Druidess, your task is to collect **Blossoming Flowers**
These flowers can be used for either of these purposes:

 • Deliver them to Cecily's Altar Garden to fill your faction's pool and receive major prizes depending on your contribution and global milestones.
 • Consume some flowers to increase the melting rate of the adversary Snowflakes pool.
 • Offer the flowers yourself to the summer deity. This will grant you quick but less interesting prizes, no items above (U) can be received from this method
FLW.desc2: Quest for the Garden of Thousand Flowers
FLW.daily: You waited for a while until some flowers had grown enough, you managed to gather **{{count}} Flowers**.
FLW.payX: You're giving me {{count}} Flowers. Is that right?

wintersummer.intro:
Welcome to the Flowers & Snowflakes Global Solstice Event! To start, please choose the faction you want to represent in this event.
Click %flw to choose **Cecily, the Fey Druidess** or %sfk to choose **Nikoliny, the Ice Queen**.
wintersummer.confirmaction: This action cannot be undone and you're gonna stick with this for the rest of the event. Are you sure?
wintersummer.asof: As an event participant, this is what you can do now:
wintersummer.already: You're already participating in the event!

statusfooter.SFK: The ICE QUEEN WINTER FACTION has collected {{count}} Crystaline Snowflakes so far
statusfooter.FLW: The FEY DRUIDESS SUMMER FACTION has collected {{count}} Blossoming Flowers so far

wintersummer.factiondescrib:
**Basic**

`+evpropic`
Build an event profile picture based on your current avatar and show off which side are you in. Keep using this to earn more **{{collectible}}**.

`+collect`
Collect **{{collectibles}}** to your personal pool.

`+deliver [X]`
Deliver X **{{collectibles}}** to {{leadername}}, increasing the global pool.

`+evclaim`
Claim any pending rewards from global milestones.
wintersummer.factionplus:
**Advanced**

`+evsquad [squadname]`
Found a collecting squad to reach certain milestones faster.

`+deposit [X]`
Deposit X **{{collectibles}}** to your Squad's pool.

`+pipeline`
Collect all of your squad's members **{{collectibles}}** and add them directly to the global pool, can only be used once.
wintersummer.prizecontents: You received a little bag from {{leader}}. With the following message:
wintersummer.prizecontents2: Inside this bag you found something else:
prizephrases: you got a bocc, goo job
Wake me up inside
It's dangerous to go alone, take this
Thanks, kiddo! Don't spend it all in one place
I swear, it's all there...
I don't know why you're so productive but I appreciate it
Thank you for your service
Hey kid, get in the van we have lootboxes
Goran no suponsaa no tekyou de okurishimasu
OwO u got a pwesent
Hey, you're pretty cute and I got you a gift >///<
It's not like  I like you or anything. Baka
Don't tell anybody I'm giving you this
Arigathanks gozaimuch
This is for you
Take these and shhhhhh
Take these and walk away
Will you be my val- sh*t, wait, wrong holiday
Sorry I can't be there in person, but here's a token of my appreciation
Honey, I don't know why anyone told you that sticker goes with that background, but here, get some seasonal bling.
Poi!

generic.next: Available again in this Server at {{remain}}
generic.newServer: New Servers cannot participate in this event. Contact the Developer or join the Support Server if you want to participate in the event with this Server.
generic.noEventPart: You're not participating in this event.

ventureFlavorTex: The snow thickens, you spend some coal to keep yourself warm.
You find the Abominable Snowman in your way, you drop everything you found and run back to the town.
You see a bear lurking the woods, you decide it is better go back to the town.
You see a extinguished fireplace from someone else, there's still some ember inside, you take it with you.
You've been walking for a while, you eat some of your candy to keep going.
You find some coal next to an abandoned mine.
You find some coal next to an abandoned mine.
You find some coal next to an abandoned mine.
You find someone else's camp. Looks like they left in a hurry, you loot the place.
You see a strange box buried in the snow, you take it with you.
You see a strange box buried in the snow, you take it with you.
You see a strange box buried in the snow, you take it with you.
You see a strange box buried in the snow, you take it with you.
You see a strange box buried in the snow, you take it with you.
While looting an abandoned mine, the cave collapses. There's a faint light above, you climb to the exit but have to leave everything behind.
You reach a mystic place, there's a shiny blue gemstone on the edge of a creek. You take it with you.
You stop for a brief while to rest.
You forgot your gloves at home, you return to the town to get them.
You find other explorers from the town, it is {{user}}, from the {{server}} neighborhood! You two exchange some items and then part ways.
You find other explorers from the town, it is {{user}}! You two exchange some items and then part ways.
The snow thickens, you spend some coal to keep yourself warm.
You see a path of broken branches in the woods, you decide to follow it.
You walk across a field of snow.
You find a sled, this will make your carrying a lot easier!
You find another explorer, they depleted their stock of candy and are starving, you give them some of yours.
You find another explorer, they have too much candy to carry, so they give you some of theirs.
You find another explorer, they are unconscious. You steal some of their candy.
You find another explorer, they are unconscious. You help them back to town.
You see a shrine for the Coal God, and leave an offering.
You give directions to a lost old woman; she rewards you with a strange box.
Some kids mug you of your candy right outside of town. Next time bring your sledgehammer.
You use some coal to keep yourself warm. As you do, some snow melts to reveal candy.
You find a well-preserved body in the snow. Since they didn't use their coal, now it's yours.
In the distance, you see a young woman singing on the North Mountain. You decide to let it go.
Your boots get little holes in them, and now your socks are wet and freezing. You spend some coal to avoid a toe-tal loss.
You hear scary noises in the woods. You don't want to be the first five minutes of a horror movie. You return to safety.
You find a frozen letter: 'Niky, I've always loved you. -Cecy'
You hit a few trees, and some candy shakes loose.
You hit a few trees, and spook away some deer.
You hit a few trees, and some gems shake lose.
You feel something hard underneath your feet - you've found a shovel!
You find a warm cave, and shelter there for a while.
You come across a bridge, and have to pay a toll to continue.
You find a frozen river. To venture across it, you have to lose some of the weight you're carrying.
You come across a diabetic explorer. You take their candy for them.
You help rouse an explorer that's dozed off in the snow. They reward you with some gems.
You follow some cries for help, and see an explorer stuck in a tree. You help them down, and they reward you with a strange box.
You investigate an abandoned coal mine, and stockpile coal while you can.
You slip and hurt your leg. Luckily, another explorer helps you back to town.
The cold winds pick up, and you lose a few loose candies to the gusts.
You find a warm fire that someone else made and rest there. You pay it forward and leave coal for another explorer to use.
Someone with a torn backpack dropped some coal and candy along the way, you pick them up.
You see the town just a couple kilometers away! Since you're that close you stop by to gather as much coal as you can.
As you arrive in the town you see that some fire took place in the nearby woods. There's a bunch of ember laying around.
Getting back to the town, you see someone giving away candy to everyone coming in. You stop by and get some.
Just as you enter back into the town, someone asks you some help to carry some boxes in, they let you have one.
Back to the town at last! But there's something buried in the snow... It is a Sapphire Ore!
Back to the town at last! But there's something buried in the snow... It is a Sapphire gemstone!
You find Noctix wandering around the town outskirts. She mourns the death of this season's tomatoes, you promptly comfort her. She gives you something in return...
You find Selenidi wandering around the town outskirts. She was bathing in the hot springs, you try to peek on her but get caught! She throws a huge lump of coal at your head...
You find Lunanuli wandering around the town outskirts. She was apparently lost, you take her back to the town. She gives you something in return...
You stop for a couple minutes to make snow angels.
You see a patch of snow just asking to be made a snowman of. If only you had a carrot.....
You take a break to build a snowman.
There's an old book buried in the snow: Fundaments of Igloomaking, Volume 1...
You see a bear, but it is going the other way so you just go on.
The sun is setting, you set camp for the rest of the day. There's plenty of firewood around so you don't spend any coal.
You see the odd sillouette of a person with deer horns... You scrub your eyes just to see that it is gone. Maybe you shouldn't eat so much candy anymore.
You pass by a village of chanting slavs, you decide to not get much closer.
You stumble upon a snow leopard. You run as fast as you can hoping it didn't see you... You dropped some of your stuff on the run.
You stumble upon a snow leopard. You run as fast as you can hoping it didn't see you... You dropped all of your stuff on the run.
You stumble upon a snow leopard. You run as fast as you can hoping it didn't see you... You decide it is better go back to the town
Snow..... snow everywhere......
You're struck by a blizzard storm. You're now a hero of the storm.
You're struck by a blizzard storm. You take shelter for a few minutes.
You see strange lights in the distance, over the mountains in the horizon.
Glowing plumes float around you, you thought it was snow but it is something else...
On top of the mountains you can see the landscape below: Far away there's another town, a strange glow emanates from its center.
On top of the mountains you can see the landscape below: At this distance you notice a column of smoke, accentuated by a strange glow nearby.
On top of the mountains you can see the landscape below: ... Actually, you can't, the fog is just too thick.
You see Halloween Town from afar, you're getting closer.

There's something buried in the snow... You try to pull it off but it is buried too deep, good thing you got a shovel with you! | There's something buried in the snow... You try to pull it off but it is buried too deep. Next time you should bring something to dig it up
You see something odd near the top of a cliff. Luckily, your trusty grappling hook helps you get to it! | You see something odd near the top of a cliff. If only there was a way to get up there...

You find a totally-out-of-place merchant in the woods. They have an unrefusable deal for you for just 250 Rubines! You don't have enough with you but you remember getting some in your journey! The merchant hands you a box, inside it there is a bunch of stuff, including a gloss-laminated, fine-print postcard. | You find a totally-out-of-place merchant in the woods. They have an unrefusable deal for you for just 250 Rubines! Unfortunately you only have so much with you and pass on it...

You see a red hooded figure in the woods, it lands behind you and grabs your bag. She steals some of your coal... | You see a red hooded figure in the woods, it lands behind you and grabs your bag. As she notices you're in a miserable situation, she gives back your bag with some extra coal she stole from someone else...
As you go forward, full of daring, you trip miserably on the root of a tree and fall with your face deep into the snow...
The cold wind howls in the distance... you keep moving.
You climb a tree to check your surroundings...
hallowinter.increaseThermo: Increase the temperature on the Thermostat to get more items!
hallowinter.journeyEnd: You finished your previous journey! Here's all you got from it:
hallowinter.packing: Ready to venture out in a journey? Right, lemme pack your things...
hallowinter.packingFailed:
Okay, looks like we don't have enough provisions for going out in the wild...
Here's a list of what we need to leave the town safely:
hallowinter.journeyGo: All set! We're now leaving the town and venturing for the next **{{time}} hours**.
hallowinter.lunaTitle: Lunanuli - Witch of the New Moon
hallowinter.seleTitle: Selenedi - Witch of the Full Moon
hallowinter.jfrostTitle: Jack Frost - The Vagrant Ice Lord

dialogues.luna_cook_intro:
Oh hello there! You're here to help out with the candy right?
As you can see, I am blind and I can't see my surroundings without my sight orb.
I am having a bit of trouble with this recipe here, can you tell me which color the fire glows each time so I know what is the next step?
dialogues.luna_cook_whatnow: Ok, what color is the fire now?
dialogues.luna_cook_failure: For the goddesses! You got it all wrong!!! Why didn't you tell me you were also blind?
dialogues.luna_cook_ok: Well, that's not what I would call *"Oh my god what a great candy"* but it is still edible.
dialogues.luna_cook_good: Yum yum... these are tasting very good! But there's still some *je ne sais quoi* missing.
dialogues.luna_cook_perfect: Oh my goddess! This tastes SO GOOD! Thank you so much for helping!
dialogues.sele_cook_intro:
Ah hi hi! You're here for candymaking amrite? Come in!
Please stay right here and read tell me what is the next step in doing these candies, the cauldron fire and the utensils will hint you about what to do!
dialogues.sele_cook_whatnow: Okay, we're doing {{candy}} now, right? This is the state of my cauldron, what should we do next?
dialogues.sele_cook_failure: Ok this is a damn mess... I think we screwed up. Just look at this sh*t.
dialogues.sele_cook_ok:
Are you sure this is how it was supposed to look like?
Well, at least it tastes good.
dialogues.sele_cook_good: This one is pretty damn good! Still doesn't look like in the recipe book.
dialogues.sele_cook_perfect: For the goddesses! Thank you for helping, pal! Look at this masterpiece of a candy we did!
